Bio cement

No kiln firing, No CO2 emissions. Grown sustainable building material.

Leading innovator bioMASON® offers the lowest carbon footprint cement product in the market. Their pre-cast materials are grown employing microorganisms..

Hub promoting and facilitating cross-sector collaborations for solutions on the waste problems in Indonesia.

Plastic bags

Less than 1 percent of plastic bags goes into a recycle bin.

Billions of plastic bags are made each year. 100 billion are thrown away according to Worldwatch Institute, with less than 1% ending into a recycle bin.

Posted 1. May 2018. 1 min read.
# learning # plastic # plastic-alternatives # save-oceans # social-responsibility # recycle
